summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the issuance of tax anticipation notes of the City for the purpose of paying the interest on the City's outstanding Unlimited Tax General Obligation Bonds, 1985, pending the receipt of authorized excess levy taxes; creating a tax anticipation note fund; and designating the City Comptroller to sell and deliver the notes and to fix their principal amount, interest rates, method of sale and other details consistent with this ordinance.
